Yonkers.Elisabeth Morrow School:
The Elisabeth Morrow School is a private coeducational day school located in Englewood, New Jersey, United States, serving students age three through the grade eight.
As of the 2015-16 school year, the school had an enrollment of 360 (plus 57 in Pre-K) students and 47.3 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 7.6:1.
The Elisabeth Morrow School is accredited by the New Jersey Association of Independent Schools.
